metadata.title: All Yum Repos Ensure Package Signature Checking
metadata.description: To ensure that signature checking is not disabled for any repos, ensure that the following line DOES NOT appear in any repo configuration files in /etc/yum.repos.d or elsewhere

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: gpgcheck=0 should not exist in any repo file within /etc/yum.repos.d

ind:textfilecontent54_object.comment: gpgcheck=0 should not exist in any repo file within /etc/yum.repos.d
